resolvePrincipalType

PrincipalType resolvePrincipalType(java.lang.String principalType)
Resolves a principal type given a string. The string is interpreted either as the name() of the Channel.Principal enum, or the internal name of a custom field, when the principal should be Channel.Principal.CUSTOM_FIELD

resolvePrincipalType

PrincipalType resolvePrincipalType(java.lang.String channelName,
                                   java.lang.String principalType)
Resolves a principal type given a string, validating that it is supported by the given channel. The string is interpreted either as the name() of the Channel.Principal enum, or the internal name of a custom field, when the principal should be Channel.Principal.CUSTOM_FIELD

save

Channel save(Channel channel)
Saves the given channel

              throws ValidationException
